Actually, Megatron did reply to Slaughter/Skulletron's comm message. 
I posted for it in my Re: Preds post. =) It's not really important 
now though. I just like to to group all posts corresponding to a 
certain character together, not necessarily under the same subject 
header.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> After recieving no response from anybody inside the  Predacon 
base, he assumed they were either busy or gone.  He started to walk 
away, when his long-range scanners picked up two bots in the distance
(Wolfenstein and Perceptor).  He waited for the two bots to come 
into sight, so he would have a chance to actually talk to others in 
this strange, new world...
